# personViewDelegate

**Instance Property**

The person-view controller delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor unowned(unsafe) var personViewDelegate: (any ABPersonViewControllerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate must adopt the [doc://com.apple.addressbookui/documentation/AddressBookUI/ABPersonViewControllerDelegate] protocol.

## Responding to View Controller Interactions

- **ABPersonViewControllerDelegate**: The `ABPersonViewControllerDelegate` protocol declares the interface that must be implemented by [doc://com.apple.addressbookui/documentation/AddressBookUI/ABPersonViewController] delegates.
